network_connect_fail: Failed to connect to the network.
connection_reset_request:
Your Learner's Block will try to connect to a Wi-Fi network, and you can connect to the same network to use it.
If you still aren't connected after a minute, reconnect to your Learner's Block, check your password and try again.
no_networks: No available Wi-Fi networks within range. Please ensure there is and reboot the device.
